page.title: 15Longleat Safari Park
page.content: Many visitors a year flock to the Longleat Safari Park. There are 22 different species of animal they consist of 6 Hippos/3 Eastern Glase Kangaroos/8 Sealions/18 Wolves/35 Lions/8 Tigers/3 Gorillas/1 Red Kangaroo/20 Dromadary Camels/14 Giraffe/8 Bacterian Camels/8 Zebra/5 Elephants/10 Ankole Cattle/80 Rhesus Monkeys/6 Rhino/2 Cape Buffalo/8 Eland/8 Peter David Deer/5 Chimpanzees/6 Lamas and 2 Ring Tailed Lemas. The carnivorous animals eat bullock heads and calves that are born dead while the herbivors eat grass in the Summer and dairy concentrate in the Winter. The park extends to 350 acres and is very successful. No animal has ever escaped from the Safari Park which shows its standard of safety.
